item.title: Formal Approach for the Verification of Onboard Autonomous Functions in Observation Satellites
item.author: dalzilio [at] laas [dot] fr (Silvano DAL ZILIO)
item.description:
Vincent Mussot, Silvano Dal Zilio, Loïc Correnson, Serge Rainjonneau, Yves Bardout, Grégoire Scano
In ERTSS 2020 — 10th International Congress and Exhibition on Embedded Real-Time Software and Systems, jan 2020.
